title: XML Loader: support parsing of atomic updates for labelled child documents
description:
The current XML Loader does not parse atomic updates for child documents correctly.
This should be fixed.

comments.content: I assume from the title you mean for labelled child documents in particular (added in SOLR-12485 recently?), vs the classical anonymous child documents which I presume did work and continues to work?
comments.author: David Smiley
